document.docAuthor: Duwal, Ram Keshari, Jung, Sunghoon, Yasunaga, Tomohide & Lee, Seunghwan
document.masterDocTitle: Annotated catalogue of the Phylinae (Heteroptera: Miridae) from the Korean Peninsula

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Annotated catalogue of the Phylinae (Heteroptera: Miridae) from the Korean Peninsula

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Europiella
Reuter, 1909
: 83
(gen. nov.). Type species:
Agalliastes stigmosus Uhler, 1893
; original designation.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Distribution . European continent (Western, Central, Eastern); Asia: South Korea (CB, CN, CW, GG, GB, GN, JN, JJ), Azerbaijan , China (Northeast, North, Northwest, Southeast, Southwest), Georgia , Japan , Kazakhstan , Russia (East Siberia, Far East, West Siberia), Uzbekistan ; North America (
Li & Zheng 1991 b
,
Kerzhner & Josifov 1999
,
Duwal et al. 2014 a
).

Host .
Artemisia absinthium
L. and
A . vulgaris
L. ( Asteraceae ) (
Wagner 1975
),
A . arbuscula Nutt.
,
A . biennis Willd
,
A . californica Less.
,
A . cana Pursh
,
A . douglasiana Besser ex Besser
,
A . frigida Willd
,
A . longifolia Nutt.
,
A . ludoviciana Nutt.
,
A . michauxiana Besser
,
A . tilesii Ledeb.
,
Lathyrus
sp. ( Fabaceae ) (
Schuh 2004
).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Europiella gilva : Schuh et al. ( 1995 ): 390
(com. nov.);
Kerzhner & Josifov ( 1999 )
: 345
(cat.);
Vinokurov et al. ( 2010 )
: 135
(cat.);
Duwal et al. ( 2014 a)
: 386
(diag.).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Host .
Artemisia vulgaris
L. ( Asteraceae ) (
Kulik 1975
), A . sp. (
Duwal et al. 2014 a
).
